products.name: Fall Limited Edition Sneakers
products.description: These low-profile sneakers are your perfect casual wear companion. Featuring a durable rubber outer sole, they’ll withstand everything the weather can offer.

products.name: ARCTERYX ACRUX LT GTX
products.description: Precision, efficiency and focus - a mountaineer needs all three qualities. The same applies to his equipment. The design of the Acrux LT is made for exceptional precision when climbing and brings all these qualities with it.

products.name: NIKE WMNS AIR JORDAN 6 RETRO *GTX*
products.description: In keeping with the season, the Jordan Brand is now releasing the Air Jordan 6 with a Gore-Tex® membrane to keep feet dry in the wet months. The upper is in brown nubuck, with purple details rounding off the look.
